page.title: 19IT'S A KNOCKOUT!
page.content: One Saturday in June our school took part in an{'It's A Knockout'}competi- tion as part of the Exeter Festival. Five teams from different schools in our area took part. There were five{ {events}consisting of a wheel-barrow race, a dressing-up game, a three- legged race, a balloon game and a surprise game. The competition was held at St. Thomas High School playing field and it{rained}during the games so we all got wet. At the end of the competition we had won. We went up to an{Exeter City F.C. player who gave us our medals. The {Mayor of Exeter}presented us with our cup and we did a lap of honour round the course. On the following Friday in assembly Mr. Helmsley told the{school}about our win.
